Posts.Content: Jul 10, 2018 08:14PM Mom_of_two wrote: Hello ladies. I went for my work up and two little dot tattoos (they look like a tiny freckle on each side of my rib cage) on July 3rd. I start my treatment on July 19th. Scheduled for 25 plus 4 booster (breast/lymph node targeted). Hoping for no side effects and just anxious to get it all over and done with. I have been enjoying getting back to my pre-chemo self. Thanks jerseymom12 for starting a thread for us July start girls!
Posts.Title: JULY 2018 Radiation? jerseymom12 Marymc86
